isis.stitle: ALTERNATOR: DELCO-REMY 20-SI SERIES, TYPE 300 (BRUSHLESS) - REPAIR PROCEDURES - REASSEMBLY

svcproc.title: REASSEMBLY
svcproc.para: Refer to Figure 10for all item number callouts in parentheses unless otherwise noted.

step1.para: Position the rectifier end frame (Item 1, ) to the stator (Item 3, ), then assemble the drive end frame and rotor assembly to the rectifier end frame and stator. Secure with 4 through bolts (Item 43).
Install outer collar (Item 21) outer retainer plate (Item 18) felt washer (Item 37) and shield (Item 50) on rotor shaft.
Position the rectifier end frame to stator then assembly the drive end frame and rotor to rectifier end frame and stator.
Fasten with four through bolts. Tighten until snug.
Install fan (Item 22) pulley and washer (Item 41) on rotor shaft. Secure with nut (Item 26). Tighten the nut to 70 - 80 ft.-lb. (95 - 108 N•m).

note.para: A hexagon hole is provided in the end of the rotor shaft for holding it secure with an Allen wrench during tightening.

important.para: If not properly tightened it is possible the nut and pulley could loosen and slip on the shaft or even come off during operation.
